Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj

loans.use: Purchasing more foodstuff for increasing the range of goods for selling

loans.name: Hasan

texts.ar:
حسن في عمر 55 سنة متزوج وله 6 اولاد له في عمله 10 سنوات يعمل في ميني ماركت محل لبيع المواد الغذائية والمعلبات والسكاكر
لقد ساهم القرض السابق في زيادة مدخوله ودعم عمله وقد لقى دعم الكامل لديه مثابرة وجدية في العمل يريد من خلال طلب
قرض له من المجموعة الى شراء مواد استهلاكية والتوسع في العمل يحب التجدد والتطور يتميز بالمثابرة في العمل يحب ان يعلم
اولاده تعليم جيد لكنه يلقى صعوبة في تحسين وضعه
texts.en: Hasan is a 55-year-old husband and father of six who is very eager to provide his children with a decent education. Hasan has a decade of experience working at his Mini Market which sells groceries, canned foods, and confectionaries. He is very assiduous and earnest in his work, which he is always seeking to further develop and advance. Hasan’s last loan from A. Majmoua helped to increase his revenues, and he would now like to ask for another loan to purchase more consumer goods and further expand his business.

loans.use: To purchase consumer goods to resell

loans.name: Khosiyat

texts.en:
Khosiyat is married with four children. Her family is an average Tajik family living in Tursunzade, Southern Tajikistan. Khosiyat sells fabrics in the central market of her home town. She has been in this trade for 30 years. Khosiyat is requesting a loan of 9000 Somoni to purchase additional merchandise for further sale. She would like to use additional financial assistance to grow her business even further. Khosiyat loves what she is doing and is looking forward to the future. She is grateful for the opportunity this business has given to provide for and sustain her family of four. We believe Khosiyat’s natural liveliness and optimism along with responsibility and serious business approach will help her make her dreams come true.


More about Tajikistan and IMON International

Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. The country is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language, epic mountain passes, and a civilization that dates back to the 4th millennium BC. And, even today, it is a complex mixture of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions.

But Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the U.S.S.R., further damaged the already weak economy. In addition, 93% of the country is mountainous and only 7% of the land is arable. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

IMON's History

Since December 2007, IMON International has worked closely with Kiva and Kiva lenders to ensure that poor and low income clients represent a viable business proposition. Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj

loans.use: Purchasing of the new fabrics for increasing the range of goods

loans.name: Ilham

texts.en:
Ilham is a 41 years old woman from Qalqilia city in North Palestine. Ilham is a very good tailor. She started tailoring for relatives and neighbors and now she started tailoring for more customers from the city.

One of Ilham sons is a Palestinian National authority employee while the other 4 sons and one daughter are students.

Ilham who is photographed in the picture took a loan from FATEN to purchase a sewing machine and thread that she needs for tailoring as the work load is increasing and is bringing in a better income.

loans.use: To purchase a sewing machine and thread

loans.name: Salwa

texts.ar:
سلوى في عمر 47 سنة عزباء تعمل في خياطة الالبسة لها في عملها 15 سنة تحب عملها وتريد التطور التجدد في العمل 
تلحم دائما ببناء مستقبل جيد فهي تطمح بفتح محل خاص لها وان تكون من اصحاب المدخول الجيد فهي دائمة الطموح
والمثابرة في العمل تتميز بالدقة والصدق في المعاملة وملاحقة كل ما هو جديد تتلقى دائما الدعم من عائلتها فهي
تدعمها دائما لكنها تلقى بعض الصعوبة في زيادة البضائع لديها تريد من خلال طلب قرض لها من المجموعة الى شراء عطورات
واكسسوارات حتى تزيد من مدخولها
texts.en: Salwa is 47 years old and single and has been working as a sewing professionA. for the past fifteen years. She is very ardent and involved in her work and conscientious with her patrons. Furthermore, she always follows the latest trends. Salwa dreams of one day opening her own store and securing a respectable income. For now, she spends what money she has on her family, who support her very much. Since she is having difficulty finding the resources to procure more merchandise, Salwa has asked for a loan from A. Majmoua to purchase perfumes and other accessories for women.

loans.use: To purchase perfumes and other accessories for women

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.fr: Emmanuel T. est travailleur de construction, et client d’ACB depuis 2007.  Il a 56 ans, il est marié, et il a 5 enfants entre 5 ans et 22 ans.  Il a fini 4 ans d’école primaire, et 3 de ses enfants vont a l’école.  Il va utiliser son prêt pour l’achat des tôles, briques, et chaux pour la construction d’une maison.  Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire est de continuer à construire des maisons pour avoir même des maisons à louer.  Pour sa famille, il voudrait éduquer ses enfants, et payer les frais médicaux de sa famille.
texts.en: Emmanuel T. is a construction worker and a client of ACB since 2007.  He is 56 years old, and has 5 children between the ages of 5 and 22.  He finished 4 years of primary education, and 3 of his children go to school.  He is going to use his loan to purchase sheet metal, bricks, and nails for the construction of a house.  His strategy to increase his business is to continue to build houses in order to have houses to rent out.  For his family, he could like to educate his children and pay for the family's medical costs.

loans.use: Purchase of sheet metal, bricks and nails

loans.name: Kamala

texts.ru:
Kamala M. 33 qoda. Ona zamujem i imeyet 2 detey. Kamala yavlyayetsya IDP personom, ona pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda i seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione  vmeste so svoim mujem i detmi. Kamala ochen trudolubiviy chelovek.
Ona uje 7 let zanimayetsya skotovodstvom, Etomu biznessu ona nauchilas u svoyeqo otca, kotoriy toje zanimalsya skotovodstvom s molodosti.
Seychas ona nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya uvelicheniya kolichestva moloko iz kotoroqa ona delayet razniye sorta sira i prodayot ix sosedem kotoriye ochen dovolni kachestvom i vkusom tovara.
texts.en:
Kamala M. is 33 years old. She is married and has two children. Kamala is an internally displaced person, she is a migrant from the town of Fuzili and now lives in the Fuzuli region together with her husband and children.

Kamala is a very hardworking person. She has been doing animal husbandry for more than seven years. She has learned this business from her father who has been also doing animal husbandry at a young age.

Right now she needs 2000 AZN to buy cows and increase the amount of milk from which she makes different kinds of cheeses and sells it to her neighbors who are very satisfied with the quality and taste of the product.

loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Josephine Khakuyia

texts.en:
Josphine Khakuyia I. is  27 years old. She is married to Dennis, who owns a barber shop. Together they have  two children. Josphine has been a green grocer owner for the last two years. 

She has never borrowed from any other MFI.  This is  her first loan from KADET.  Josephine plans use the loan to purchase vegetables, potatoes and fruits to sell in her business. With the anticipated profits she plans to open a food café. 

Her dream is to succeed through KADET.

loans.use: To purchase e vegetables, potatoes and fruits

loans.name: Francois

texts.fr: François H. est mécanique, et client d’ACB depuis 2007.  Il a 49 ans, et il a 3 enfants entre 7 ans et 14 ans.  Il a une éducation d’école primaire, et tous ses enfants vont à l’école.  Il va utiliser son prêt pour l’achat des portes, fenêtres, et ciments pour la construction de sa maison.  Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire est d’améliorer son projet de construction pout avoir une maison propre.  Il voudrait avoir une propre maison, et payer les frais scolaires pour ses enfants.
texts.en: François H. is a mechanic and has been a client of ACB since 2007.  He is 49 years old, and he has 3 children between the ages of 7 and 14 years old.  He has a primary school education, and all of his children go to school.  He is going to use his loan to purchase doors, windows and cement for the construction of his house.  His strategy to improve the affair is to better his construction project in order to have a decent house.  He would like to have his own house and to pay for the educational costs of his children.

loans.use: Purchase of doors, windows, cement

loans.name: Margaret Njoki

texts.en:
Margaret has been farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last eight years.  She also runs a posho mill in the same town.  She is 46 years old and is a single mother of one child.

She was introduced to KADET by her friend and this will be her first loan.  She plans to use the loan amount to buy maize mill and sell it for a profit.

In the future, Margeret hopes to increase her milling production and stock flour which she will be selling in bulk.

loans.use: To buy maize  mill

loans.name: Abbasse

texts.ar:
عباس في عمر 53 سنة متزوج وله اربع اولاد له في عمله 15  سنة يحب عمله فهو يعمل في بيع المكسرات للأولاد على العربة في موسم
المدارس وايضا يبيع الفواكه الصيفية في موسم الصيف بالاضافة الى انه يتعهد بعض المنازل من تحسين وغيره فهو متطور ومتنوع الاعمال
حتى يزيد من مدخوله ومدخول عائلته وقد ساهم القرض السابق في فتح مجال عمل جديد له حيث استطاع ان يشتري ويبيع الفاكهة
الموسمية وقد لقي دعم كامل من عائلته يريد من خلال طلب قرض جديد له من المجموعة الى شراء سيارة للعمل حتى يستطيع ان يتطور من
العربة الى السيارة 
+ شراء صحون ومواد اولية للعمل الموسمي
texts.en: Abbasse is a 53-year-old husband and father of four. For the past 15 years he has been working as a street vendor selling nuts to children during the school year and fruits during the summer while also engaging in house contracting on the side. Abbasse seeks to be very dynamic and multiskilled so that he can support himself and his family. It was his last loan from A. Majmoua which enabled Abbasse to start selling seasonA. fruits. Now he would like to obtain another loan to purchase plates and raw materiA. for the summer season as well as a car to replace the wheelbarrow he uses to cart around his wares.

loans.use: To purchase car , plates and raw materials

loans.name: Silika Kazungu

texts.en:
Silika Kazungu K. is 32 years old. She is married to Danson and they have two children. Silika has been a fishmonger for the last ten years in Mtwapa, Mombasa.

Silika managed to service her first KADET loan successfully and this marks her second borrowing from KADET to finance her business. She plans to use the money to purchase fish stock in bulk. 

With the anticipated profit Silika hopes to purchase a freezer.Her hopes and dreams are to expand her business further.

loans.use: To purchase fish in bulk

loans.name: Habiba

texts.en:
Habiba T. is 47 years old. She and her husband have 4 children. To improve her family position and support her husband with family expenses, Habiba started her business 11 years ago. She bakes “lepeshka” at home. Her daughter helps her with the business.  Habiba sells the majority of her products from her home. However, she also runs a stall in the central local market for selling the”lepeshka”.  Habiba is doing all she can to ensure her children have the best future. Now she requests 7500 Somoni. She is planning to purchase the flour for her business at wholesale. Habiba is grateful for everyone supporting her and promises to manage the loan with accuracy.  


More about Tajikistan and IMON International

Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. The country is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language, epic mountain passes, and a civilization that dates back to the 4th millennium BC. And, even today, it is a complex mixture of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions.

But Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the U.S.S.R., further damaged the already weak economy. In addition, 93% of the country is mountainous and only 7% of the land is arable. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

IMON's History

Since December 2007, IMON International has worked closely with Kiva and Kiva lenders to ensure that poor and low income clients represent a viable business proposition. Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj

loans.use: To purchase flour at wholesale for baking the national bread “lepeshka”.

loans.name: Bahrullo

texts.ru: Шарипов Бахрулло проживает в районе Вахдат. Возраст, 33 года. Женат. Имеет троих детей. Жена занимается торговлей. Она продает детскую и женскую одежду. Сам Бахрулло высшего образования не имеет. Занимается торговлей риса. Он привозит товар из Худжанда и продает у себя дома, оптом. Этим видом деятельности занимается уже 8 лет. Кредит берет для увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: S. Bahrullo lives in the Vahdat region. He's thirty-three years old, married and has three children. His wife works as a women's and children's clothes salesperson. Bahrullo doesn't have a university level of education. For the past eight years he has sold rice. He purchases it by bulk in Hudjanda, transports it to his home city and sells it for a profit. He's asking for a loan to increase his goods turnover.

loans.use: To increase goods turnover

loans.name: Sylvestre

texts.fr: Sylvestre H. est aide technicien et travailleur de construction, et il est client d’ACB depuis 2007.  Il est né à Kigali, marie, et il a 6 enfants.  Il a une éducation primaire, et 3 de ses enfants vont a l’école.  Il va utiliser son prêt pour l’achat des tôles, sables, et ciments pour la construction des maisons.  Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire est de continuer à construire pour avoir des maisons à louer.  Pour sa famille, il voudrait payer les frais scolaires pour ses enfants.
texts.en: Sylvestre H. is a technician's aide and a construction worker. He is has been a client of ACB (Kiva Field Partner) since 2007. He was born in Kigali, he is married, and he has 6 children. He has a primary school education, and 3 of his children attend school. He will use his loan to purchase tiles, sand, and cement used to build houses. His strategy to expand his business is to keep building in order to build houses destined for rental. As for his family, he would like to pay for his children's education.

loans.use: To purchase tiling, sand, and cement.

loans.name: Mary Wambui

texts.en:
Mary is a 32-year-old single mother of two children, aged 17 and 14.  She runs a green grocery shop and has been in operation for three years, earning an income of KES 4,300.

This is her third loan after successfully repaying the previous ones.  She intends to use the loan to buy more tomatoes and cabagges for sale.

With the accumulate savings, she wants to expand her business.  She hopes to be a leading business woman, buy a plot of land and build a house, and also give her children a quality education.

loans.use: To buy tomatoes and cabbages

loans.name: George Gathayo

texts.en:
George has been operating his motorcycle transport business in Naivasha town for the last two years.  He is 42 years old and is married to Damaris Njoki.  They have two children.

He was introduced to KADET by his friend.  This will be his second loan.  George repaid his first loan of Kshs 10,000 well and in good time.  With this new loan, he plans to renew the insurance coverage for his motorcycle and to service it.

In the future, George hopes to own a taxi  to operate in Naivasha town.

loans.use: To renew insurance coverage and service motorcycle

loans.name: Eugene

texts.fr: Eugene K. est aide technicien et travailleur de construction, et il est client d’ACB depuis 2007.  Il a 42 ans, il est né à Rwanda, marie, et il a 3 enfants entre 7 ans et 12 ans.  Tous ses enfants vont à l’école.  Il va utiliser son prêt pour l’achat des tôles, les chaux, et les portes pour la construction des maisons à louer.  Sa stratégie est de construire une maison à louer a part de la maison d’habitation.  Il voudrait éduquer ses enfants, payer les frais médicaux de sa famille, et avoir la bonne sante pour la famille.
texts.en: Eugene K. is a technician's aide and a construction worker. He has been a client of ACB (Kiva Field Partner) since 2007. He is 42 years old, he was born in Rwanda, he is married, and he has 3 children between the ages of 7 and 12. All of his children attend school. He will use his first loan to purchase tiling, lime, and doors, in order to build rental houses.  He plans on building a house and to rent par of it. He would like to educate his children, to pay for the family's medical expenses, and to have his family in good health.

loans.use: To purchase tiling, lime, and doors.

loans.name: Chelimo

texts.en:
Chelimo is 24 years old.  He is married to Hilda Cheptoo, who is a house wife.   He supports a family of five people and has one child who is 10 months old. 

Chelimo practices livestock farming.  He has been in business for two years and earns a monthly income of Kshs 12,500.

He is borrowing his first loan of Kshs 5,000 to add more stock for his business. He will buy more goats to raise and resell later at a profit.  He plans to use the anticipated profit to diversify his business by opening a retail shop. 

Chelimo has dreams of buying land and expanding his livestock farming.  He believes that with a capital base he will be able to grow his business.

loans.use: To purchase more goats

loans.name: Rukia Bini

texts.en: Rukia Bini A., 42 years old, is married to Ghalib. Rukia owns a beauty shop and has been in this business for the last two years. She has never borrowed from any other MFI, and this marks her second loan from KADET. She plans to use the loan to purchase hair products, creams, soaps and shampoo for her business. The anticipated profits will be directed into the expansion of her business. Rukia's dream is to succeed in life.

loans.use: to purchase hair products, creams, soaps and shampoo

loans.name: Eugene

texts.fr: Eugene M. est aide mécanicien et travailleur de construction et aide mécanicien, et client d’ACB depuis 2007.  Il a 43 ans, il est né a Rwanda, et il est célibataire.  Il a une éducation d’école primaire, et il va utiliser son prêt pour l’achat des tôles, sables, portes, et chaux pour la construction des maisons.  Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire est de continuer à construire les parcelles pou qu’il puisse d’avoir les maisons à louer.  Apres avoir construire une maison pour lui-même, il va marier.
texts.en: Eugene M. is a mechanic's aide, a construction worker, and he has been a member of ACB (Kiva Field Partner) since 2007. He is 43 years old, he was born in Rwanda, and he is single. He has a primary school education, and he will use his loan to purchase tiles, sand, doors, and lime to build houses. He is business plans are to build in order to have houses to rent. After he is able to build a house for himself, he plans to get married.

loans.use: To purchase tiles, sand, doors, and lime.

loans.name: Maclina Nduku

texts.en: Maclina, 50 years old, is married to Joel. She has five children aged between 18 and 29 years old. Maclina has been farming for the past four years with an income of about KES 25,000 per month. She has a good history with KADET, and this is her third loan, after having successfully repaid the previous ones. She wants to use the loan amount to buy farm tools and materials to build a small farm house. She hopes to grow different varieties of crops.

loans.use: to buy farm tools  and materials to build a small farm house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Pay back money I have borrowed from parents to buy house furniture

loans.name: Benson Salaipei

texts.en:
Benson Salaipei P. is 26 years old.  He is married and the father of two children. Benson has been farming for the last four years. His farm is in a productive area which has proved to be good for wheat farming.

Benson learned about KADET LTD through a marketing campaign done by KADET staff in his area of residence. This will be his second loan, which he is planning to use to prepare for his wheat farming, which normally does well in his area due to good climatic conditions. Benson hopes to use the profit from this loan to acquire more land for farming to increase his wheat production and educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to become a large scale farmer, buy a bigger piece of land and build a plot. Benson is a young and energetic man who can do more if supported financially

loans.use: to prepare for his wheat farming

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a 36-year-old widow who supports her family of four children. Her firstborn is 20 years old and her youngest is 5 years old. Caroline buys and sells goats and chickens and she has been in business for 5 years, earning a monthly income of KES 2,000. 

Caroline has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to increase her stock of goats instead of chickens. She will then embark on fattening the goats and sell them at a profit. The anticipated profits will be used to purchase a plot for business and a family home. Caroline has hopes of buying a tractor, which will be used for ploughing.

loans.use: to buy more goats for future resale

loans.name: Mona

texts.ar:
منى في عمر 41 سنة متزوجة وتعمل في مجال التجميل وبيع فساتين السهرة  وهي تعمل متجولة منى طموحة مثابرة وتحب عملها هي متزوجة ولها 2
تحب عملها وتسعى جاهدا الى تحسينه وتطويره فهي تحب التطور والتجدرد ولكن تواجها صعوبة في المنافسة وتنقصها المادة لتزيد
من مدخولها وقد ساهم القرض السابق في تحسين ظروفها وزيادة البضائع لديها زبائنها هم من جيرانها ومحيطها اكثر احلامها
هو تعليم اولادها تريد من خلال طلب قرض لها من المجموعة الى استئجار محل وافتتاحه كمحل خاص لها
texts.en: Mona is a 41-year-old wife and mother of two who wants nothing more than to give her children a good education. Mona sells evening gowns door-to-door in her community. She is very determined and industrious and is always working hard to develop her business. Nevertheless, she faces stiff competition, and struggles with a lack of resources. Since Mona’s last loan from A. Majmoua effectively helped her improve her situation, she was interested in applying for another so that she could rent space from which to sell her wares.

loans.use: To rent store space

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en: This is 34 year-old Zainab M.. She is married and has four children ages 4, 8, 10 and 15. In 2000, Zainab established her foods business where she sells palm oil and rice. She began her business because she wanted to sustain her family and make a profit. Working six days a week and eight hours a day, she earns about Le 500,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000 in order to  purchase more stock (20 cases of palm oil @ Le90,000 and 15 of rice bags @ Le105,000) She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 400,000. In the future, Zainab plans to educate her children to college level and help her husband to build a house for the family. She would also like to become a supplier to other retailers. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To purchase more food for her business.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is currently in business selling rice, onions, cooking oil and sugar.  She is 38 years old and is married, with 6 children.  Five of them go to school.  She requested a loan so that she can stock more rice, onions, cooking oil and sugar, and gain extra profits.  Jane hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To stock more rice, onions, cooking oil and sugar.

loans.name: Kimani

texts.en:
Kimani K., 75 years old, is married to Lydia Njeri, who contributes to the family income. He has eight children and has been running his retail shop for five years with an income of about KES 7,000 per month.

Kimani has a good history with KADET, and this is his third loan from KADET, after having successfully repaid the previous one. He hopes to improve his family's living standards and be self-reliant.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, flour and clothes

loans.name: Mabinty

texts.en: This is 27 year-old Mabinty K.. She is married and has three children ages 3, 7, and 11. In 2006, Mabinty established her used clothing business. She began her business because she wanted to be self-employed. Working six days a week and seven hours a day, she earns about Le 450,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000 in order to buy additional used clothing. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 350,000. In the future, Mabinty plans to educate her children to college level, buy a commercial vehicle for additional profit making, and become a supplier to other retailers. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy additional used clothing for her business.

loans.name: Simiren

texts.en:
Simiren M. N., 41 years old, is married and blessed with three children. Simiren has been farming maize in the Narok area, which is very conducive for maize farming, for the last five years. 

Simiren learned about KADET through a marketing campaign done by KADET staff in his area of residence. This will be his third loan, which he is planning to use to buy maize seeds and fertilizers. He hopes to use the profit from this loan to acquire more land for farming to increase his wheat production and to educate his children. Simiren's hope is to become a large scale farmer, buy a bigger piece of land and build a permanent home. He says that he is a diligent man who can do more if supported financially.

loans.use: to buy maize seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Mary Wangari

texts.en:
Mary Wangari is 35 years old and married to Arthur Maina, who contributes to the family income. She has three children aged 16, 10, and 4 years old. Mary has been running her farm for about two years with an average income of KES 13,000 per month.

This is Mary's second loan, after having successfully repaid the previous one well and in good time. She hopes to become a leading poultry farmer in her town and give her children quality education.

loans.use: to buy chickens and to buy manure for the tea farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add more stock to her  business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more ground nuts for her store

loans.name: Saer

texts.ar:
سائر في عمر 20 سنة اعزب يعمل في بيع الالبسة الجاهزة يحب عمله وله فيه 5 سنوات يتميز بحبه لعمله والتطور السريع
فيه فهو طموح مثابر ومتواصل التطور يريد دائما الافضل في العمل من خلال عمله استطاع ان يثبت نفسه ولكنه
يعاني صعوبة في المنافسة لقلة المادة يريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى زيادة البضائع وادخار مبلغ كبير كي
يستطيع ان يفتتح محل اكبر وان يزيد من مدخوله
texts.en: Saer is 20 years and single and has been retailing ready-made clothes for the past five years. He stands out for his desire to constantly grow and develop as well as for his perfectionism. Although he has managed to establish himself professionally, because of his limited resources, Saer struggles with some tough competition. Accordingly, Saer has petitioned a loan from Al Majmoua to procure more wares and to relocate to a larger store.

loans.use: To procure more wares and relocate to a larger store

loans.name: Faheem

texts.en:
Faheem R. is a Palestinian from Ramallah city. Faheem owns a small cake bakery. He is married and a father of two daughters and two sons. Faheem produces cakes, cookies and bread and sells to shops in Ramallah and the neighboring cities.

Faheem took a loan from FATEN to purchase a dough mixer which will save time and increase the production. Faheem's oldest son is a National Palestinian Authority and will help his father repay the loan.

Faheem was photographed in FATEN's office.

loans.use: To purchase a dough mixer

loans.name: Robert Kinyanjui

texts.en:
Robert is 27 years old and married to Regina Wairimu, who contributes to the family income. He has been selling clothes and umbrella shades for four years with an income of KES 5,000 per month. 

Robert has never borrowed from any other MFI. This is his first loan from KADET LTD and he wants to use it to buy more clothes and umbrellas to resell. He hopes to expand his business and open a shop to sell shoes and improve his family income.

loans.use: to buy clothes and umbrellas

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John K., 24 years old, is married to Nancy Kazi and together they have one son. Nancy works as a hairdresser, providing some income for the family. John operates  a motorcycle transportation service and also sells used clothes. He has been in this business for three years, earning a monthly income of 20,000 KES.

This will be John's first loan from KADET LTD and he plans to use it to buy one bail of used clothes to resell. With the interest that he will get, he wants to buy more used clothes to resell. In the future, John would like to be a used clothes distributor, buy a car and start taxi work.

loans.use: to buy one bail of used clothes to resell

loans.name: Bubush

texts.en:
Bubush R. is a 58-year-old farmer from Kurbu village. She was born in a large family of farmers. After graduating from industrial college, she took a job as a shop assistant at the local market. When Bubush was 18, she got married and soon became the mother of six children. At present, Bubush is retired. In order to have a source of income in addition to her pension, she breeds livestock and cultivates wheat and perennial herbs.
   
A persistent person, Bubush works hard to enlarge her business and achieve success. Today she has one dairy cow, twenty sheep, one horse, and one bull calf. Her monthly profits may vary up to 30,000 KGS, which shows her ability and her determination to improve her business. Bubush plans to use her loan of 120,000 KGS to purchase one more dairy cow, sheep and bull calves. With the revenues, Bubush plans to renovate her house and help pay for her son's wedding. Bubush is an attentive mother to her family. She takes care of everyone and is a dear friend. She is also a wonderful grandmother to her grandchildren, for whom she works so hard.   

Bai-Tushum and Partners uses Kiva funding to target the especially vulnerable population. Bai-Tushum and Partners is one of the leading microfinance institutions in Kyrgyzstan. As a reliable financial partner, Bai-Tushum contributes to the economic development of the Kyrgyz Republic through the delivery of microfinance services in rural and urban areas that lead to increased employment and meet the interests of its clients and investors.

loans.use: To purchase cows and sheep

loans.name: Vicente Mauricio

texts.es:
Vicente Mauricio M. M.  tiene 23 años, vive en Unión Libre con su esposa,  en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 1 hija. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. DIVINO NIÑO se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo pertenece al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas en ciclo corto de siembra de maíz, arroz.

Vicente Mauricio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en  Agro Servicios San Jacinto y vende en el mismo lugar.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, y arroz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener un terreno

Le gusta estudiar
texts.en:
Vicente Mauricio M. M. is 23 and in a common-law marriage. He lives with his wife in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province. He has one daughter.

The members of the V.R.C. Divino Niño ["Holy Child"] are located in the Estero Lindo district, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. The 12 members of this community bank work in short-cycle agricultural labour, sowing corn and rice.

Vincente Mauricio works in agriculture, sowing corn and rice. He purchases his products in Agro Servicios San Jacinto and sells in the same location.

He is requesting this loan for sowing corn and rice, and to buy supplies and seeds. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to buy a plot of land.

He enjoys studying.

loans.use: the purchase of supplies and seeds

loans.name: Pariken

texts.en:
Pariken O. is 24 years old. He is married and has been blessed with four children. Pariken is a businessman who sells juice and snacks. He has been doing this for the last five years.

His business is strategically located in the town center, where he is able to reach more customers. He learned about KADET LTD through a marketing campaign conducted by KADET staff in his area of residence. This will be his first loan. He is planning to buy more inventory of juice and snacks. 

He hopes to use the profit from this loan to acquire land to build rental houses and to educate his children. Pariken hopes to become a large-scale businessman. He is a young and vigorous man who can work to achieve his goals.

loans.use: To purchase inventory of juice and snacks

loans.name: Segundo Cristóbal

texts.es:
Segundo Cristóbal G. tiene 36 años, vive en Unión Libre con su esposa,  en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 1 hija. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. DIVINO NIÑO se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo pertenece al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas en ciclo corto de siembra de maíz, arroz.

Segundo Cristóbal se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en  Agro Servicios San Jacinto y vende en el mismo lugar.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, y arroz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener una Mecánica

Le gusta jugar fútbol, y arreglar vehículos
texts.en:
Segundo Cristóbal G. is 36 años and in a common-law marriage. He lives with his wife in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province. He has one daughter.

The members of the V.R.C. Divino Niño ["Holy Child"] are located in the Estero Lindo district, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. The 12 members of this community bank work in short-cycle agricultural labour, sowing corn and rice.

Segundo Cristobal works in agriculture, sowing corn and rice. He purchases his products in Agro Servicios San Jacinto and sells in the same location.

He is requesting this loan for sowing corn and rice, and to buy supplies and seeds. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to have a mechanic's shop.

He enjoys playing soccer and fixing vehicles.

loans.use: the purchase of supplies and seeds

loans.name: Rabii

texts.ar:
ربيع في عمر 33 سنة يعمل في صالون للحلاقة رجالي له فيه 17 سنة يحب عمله ويريد التجديد والتطور فيه متزوج وله ولد
له زبائن كثر من محيطه جيرانه كان للقرض السابق عليه اثر جيد فهو يحب دائما ملاحقة ما هو جديد في العمل لديه خبرة كبيرة
يريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء معدات جديدة للحلاقة زائد تحسين ديكور المحل كان يلقى منافسة كبيرة
لكن ينقصه المادة
texts.en: Rabii is a 33-year-old husband and father who has been serving his neighbors and generA. community as a men’s hair stylist for the past 17 years. Rabii is always eager to reinvent himself professionally and accordingly is constantly following the latest developments in hair fashion. Although his last loan was very helpful, because his business faces stiff competition, Rabii would like to apply for a loan from A. Majmoua to purchase new hairstyling equipment and to spruce up the store’s décor.

loans.use: To purchase new hairstyling equipment and spruce up store's decor

loans.name: 18 Of September Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal “18 DE SEPTIEMBRE” es un grupo de 9 mujeres que han decidido formar esta banca comunal para recibir crédito, capacitación y atención en salud.  La B. C. “18 DE SEPTIEMBRE”,  es parte del centro focal de SANTIAGO II, están iniciando su cuarto ciclo.
Cada una de ellas tienen negocios propios, de diferentes tipos tanto de servicio como comercio. Entre ellos tenemos: venta de ropa, venta de regalos, vajilla y papel de regalo, venta de fruta, venta de ropa, peluquería, venta de medias, confección de mantas y polleras.
Para su organización, la B. C.  18 DE SEPTIEMBRE cuenta con una mesa directiva integrada por una presidenta, la señora  Maria, una tesorera, la señora  Eulogia y una secretaria de actas, la señora  Evelia.
 
La Presidenta, la señora María, vive con su  esposo y su  hijo.   El negocio de la señora   Maria es la venta de vajillas.  El mismo fue aprendido de la hermana, hace cinco años, le ayuda el esposo en las ventas.   El préstamo solicitado fue por Bs.2500.- y será destinado para la compra de vajilla.

La señora presidenta ya ha sido socia de  Pro Mujer dos años,  cuando se le consulta que es lo que le gusta de la institución, ella responde “la capacitación”.
texts.en:
The communal bank named "18 of September" is a group of 9 women who decided to form this communal bank in order to receive a loan, support, and health care. The communal bank "18 of September" is a member of the central organization Santiago II, and they are on their fourth loan cycle. 

Each of the members has their own business, of various types and services, such as commerce. Among them are: clothing sales, souvenir sales, dinnerware and gift wrapping sales, fruit sales, hair salon, stockings sales, and seamstress. 

In their group, the communal bank "18 of September" has a leadership group made up of the leader, Maria, a treasurer, Eulogia, and a secretary, Evelia. 

The leader of the group, Maria, lives with her husband and their son. Maria's business is the sale of dinnerware. She learned the business from her sister five years ago, and her husband helps her with the sales. The loan requested is in the amount of 2500 Bs. and it will be used to purchase dinnerware. 

The leader of the group has been a member of Pro Mujer (Kiva Field Partner) for two years. When she was asked what she likes about the organization, she said "the loan process".

loans.use: To purchase dinnerware.

loans.name: Bertha Patricia

texts.es:
Bertha Patricia U. C. tiene 28 años, vive en Unión Libre con su esposo,  en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 1 hija. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. DIVINO NIÑO se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo pertenece al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas en ciclo corto de siembra de maíz, arroz.

Bertha Patricia se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en  Agro Servicios San Jacinto y vende en el mismo lugar.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, y arroz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener una Casa

Le gusta ver televisión
texts.en:
Bertha Patricia U. C. is 28 and is in a common-law marriage. She lives with her husband in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province. She has one daughter.

The members of the V.R.C. Divino Niño ["Holy Child"] are located in the Estero Lindo district, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. The 12 members of this community bank work in short-cycle agricultural labour, sowing corn and rice.

Bertha Patricia works in agriculture, sowing corn and rice. She purchases her products in Agro Servicios San Jacinto and sells in the same location.

She is requesting this loan for sowing corn and rice, and to buy supplies and seeds. The support of this loan will help her economically to supply her needs. She confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. Her dream is to have a house.

She enjoys watching television.

loans.use: the purchase of supplies and seeds

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.ar:
احمد في عمر 42 سنة متزوج يعمل تعهدات وديكورات المنازل له في عمله 10 سنوات يحب عمله ويسعى دائما الى تطوير
عمله ونفسه ولكنه يلق صعوبة مادية في زيادة مدخوله وتحسين وضع عمله عمله يتميز بالدقة والقلة الموجودة في هذا المجال
يتميز هو بدقة في عمله والثقة والمجارات الموديلات الجديدة يحب ان يطولا نفسه من خلال ملاحقة كل جديد في هذا العمل
يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة الى شراء معدات للعمل ماكنة لحام + كمبروسيور وتكملة دفع ال بيك اب لأنه طموح ويريد
زيادة المعدات لملاحقة كل جديد في العمل
texts.en: Ahmad is 42 years old and married. He has been working for the past ten years in house contracting and interior design. He is always eager to improve himself and his business, although this is not completely easy because of his modest finances. Ahmad provides services which very few other businesses can offer. His work is distinguished by thoroughness and integrity, in addition to which he constantly keeps up with the latest industry techniques. Ahmad was interested in seeking a loan from Al Majmoua to purchase new equipment for his business, including a welding machine and a compressor, as well as to complete the payments for his pickup truck.

loans.use: To purchase welding machine and compressor and to complete payment of pickup truck

loans.name: Robert Lampeshua

texts.en:
Robert  Lampeshua P.  is 32 years old. He is married and supports four people in the family. Robert has been buying and selling sheep and cattle for the last seven  years.

Robert learned about KADET LTD from a colleague who is already a KADET registered client. This will be his first loan, which he is planning to use to buy more animals for sale. He hopes to use the profit from this loan to expand his business. His future dream is to be able to buy a bigger piece of land where he can rear animals. His hope and dream is to become a large scale businessman. Robert is a hardworking man who is determined to achieve his set goals.

loans.use: to buy more animals

loans.name: Cosme Olivio

texts.es:
Cosme Olivio N. R. tiene 60 años, vive en Unión Libre con su esposa,  en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No Tiene hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. DIVINO NIÑO se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo pertenece al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas en ciclo corto de siembra de maíz, arroz.

Cosme Olivio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en  Agro Servicios San Jacinto y vende en el mismo lugar.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, y arroz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener su propio carro 

Le gusta ver televisión y hacer muchos amigos
texts.en:
Cosme Olivio N. R. is 60 years old; he lives with his common-law spouse in the canton of Ventanas, in the Los Rios province. He doesn't have children. 

The members of the communal bank "Devine Infant" is located in the community of Estero Lindo in Ventanas. It is a group of 12 members who are short-term agriculturists who plant corn and rice. 

Cosme Olivio is an agriculturist who plants corn and rice. He purchases his products in Agro Servicios San Jacinto and he resells them in the same location. 

He requests a loan to plant corn and rice, to purchase products and seeds. With the support of the loan he will be able to meet his needs, and to face the difficult challenge of plagues, illness, and the changing weather. His dream is to have his own car. 

He enjoys watching television and to make many new friends.

loans.use: To purchase products and seeds.

loans.name: Mabinty

texts.en: This is 32 year-old Mabinty K.. She is married and has three children ages 2, 4, and 8. In 2003, Mabinty established her assorted food items business where she sells mayonnaise, eggs, milk, etc. She began her business because she wanted to make a profit. Working six days a week and six hours a day, she earns about Le 500,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000 in order to buy more stock for her shop. Mabinty hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 250,000. In the future, Mabinty plans to educate her children to university level and build a house. She would also like to open another shop and hire employees. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To add more stock to her stall.

loans.name: Claudio Gerardo

texts.es:

Los miembros de la V.R.C. DIVINO NIÑO se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo pertenece al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas en ciclo corto de siembra de maíz, arroz.

Claudio Gerardo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en  Farma-Agro y vende en el mismo lugar.

Le gusta jugar futbol.
texts.en:
Claudio Gerardo R. M. is 38 years old; he lives with his common-law spouse and their children in the canton of Ventanas, in the Los Rios province. They have 4 children of varying ages. 

The members of the communal bank "Devine Infant" is located in the community of Estero Lindo in Ventanas. It is a group of 12 members who are short-term agriculturists who plant corn and rice. 

Claudio Gerardo is an agriculturist who plants corn and rice. He purchases his products in Farma-Agro and resells them in the same location. 

He requests a loan to purchase corn, rice, and to purchase materials and seeds. This loan will support him financially, allowing him to meet his needs and to face the difficult challenges of plagues, illness, and the changing weather. His dream is to see his daughter attend school. 

He enjoys playing soccer.

loans.use: To purchase products and seeds.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. DIVINO NIÑO se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo pertenece al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas en ciclo corto de siembra de maíz, arroz.

Le gusta escuchar música
texts.en:
Yolanda Zulema Z. M. is 41 years old, she lives in a common-law marriage with her partner in Ventanas, a canton of the Los Ríos Province. She has 3 children. 

The V.R.C. Divino Niño (Divine Child Communal Bank) is located in the Estero Lindo precinct, located in the Ventanas canton; it is composed of 12 members who engage in short-cycle agricultural labor, growing crops like maize and rice.

Yolanda Zulema engages in agriculture, growing maize and rice. She buys her products in the Agro Servicios San Jacinto and sells them in the same place.

The loan she is requesting will be used to sow maize and rice by buying supplies and seeds. The loan will help her economically, as thanks to it she will fulfill her needs, as well as face challenges such as pests, illnesses and climate changes. She dreams of running her own grocery store.

She likes listening to music.

loans.use: To buy supplies and seeds

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en: Gladys is currently in a business of selling mixed goods.  She is 30 years old and married to a seller of mixed goods.  She has 4 children, 3 of whom go to school.  She requested for a loan to stock more mixed goods.   Gladys hopes to expand her business with extra profits in the future.

loans.use: To stock more mixed goods.

loans.name: Lesinko Ole

texts.en:
Lesinko Ole N.  is 26  years old. He is married and blessed with one child. Lesinko is a businessman who has been selling juices and snacks for the last six years. His business is strategically located in the town's main stage, which attracts more customers, especially travelers and school children, to buy his products.

Lesinko learned about KADET through a marketing campaign done by KADET staff in his area of residence. This will be his first loan, which he is planning to use to buy more inventory of juices and snacks. He hopes to use the profit from this loan to acquire land to build rental houses and to educate his siblings. Lesinko's hopes and dreams are to become a prominent businessman and import products from overseas. He is a young and energetic man who can do more if supported financially.

loans.use: to buy more inventory of juices and snacks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add more timber to her business

He has never borrowed from any other MFI. This is his first loan from KADET, and he plans to use it to purchase cooking oil, flour and rice. The anticipated profits will be directed into the expansion of his business. Denis' dream is to become a wholesaler.

loans.name: Rabii

texts.ar:
ربيع في عمر 37 متزوج وله ولدان يعمل في حدادة وتصليح السيارات له في عمله 18 سنة له خبرة واسعة في هذا المجال
يحب عمله ويريد المزيد من التطور والتجدد في العمل يحب عائلته ويريد ان يحسن من وضع عائلته المادي والاجتماعي 
له تاريخ جيد مع المجموعة وقد ساهم القرض السابق في المزيد من التحسن والتطور يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة
الى تكملة عمار منزله لقد تلقى الدعم الكامل من عائلته في اثناء قرضه السابق
texts.en: Rabii is a 37-year-old husband and father of two who has been working in automotive body repair for the past eighteen years. Despite his extensive experience, Rabii continues to push himself to grow professionally. Given the positive impact of his last loan, Rabii was interested in securing another loan from Al Majmoua to finish the construction work on his home.

loans.use: To complete construction work on his home

loans.name: Samer

texts.ar:
سامر متزوج وله ولدان وهو في عمر 46 سنة يعمل سائق عام له في عمله 12 سنة يحب عمله ويجيده جيدا يريد دائما التجديد
والتطيور في عمله اهله واولاده اولى اهتماماته يريد ان يعلم اولاده بصورة جيدة وان يكون لهم في المجتمع وضع مقبول وجيد
لقد ساعده القرض القديم من المجموعة بشكل جيد حيث استطاع ان يشتري فان خاص له والان يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة
الى صيانة الفان وتحسين وضع الموتور والفرش حتى يستطيع في مواسم السياحة من استقبال زبائن سواح يحب عمله ويريد مستقبل جيد
له ولعائلته
texts.en: Samer is a 46-year-old husband and father of two who is keen to provide his children with a good education and allow them to achieve a respectable social status. For the past twelve years, Samer has been driving a tai, which he excels at and enjoys very much. His last loan from Al Majmoua helped him procure his own van. Now, Samer wants to ask for another loan to have maintenance performed on the van’s motor and to have the upholstery redone so that the van can be in a good condition to ferry tourists around.

loans.use: To perform maintenance on van's motor and to change the upholstery

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy more stock for her business

loans.name: Bladimir

texts.es:
Bladimir es  soltero, vive con u madre y trabaja en una carpintería de aluminio, donde elaboran puertas, ventanas, etc. Tiene su casa propia ubicada en la urbanización Copacabana de la ciudad de El Alto. 
El crédito que ahora solicita será utilizado en la compra de material de construcción (arena, cemento, ladrillos, etc.) para construir una habitación más en su casa y tener más comodidad.
 Es el cuarto crédito con IMPRO y el segundo via Kiva. El análisis de sus ingresos y gastos indica que puede ser sujeto de crédito, además de que su historial de pagos con IMPRO es bueno.
texts.en:
Bladimir is single, he lives with his mother, and he works in a metal shop where they make doors, windows, etc. He has his own home located in the community of Copacabana, in the city of El Alto. 

The loan will be used to purchase construction material (sand, cements, bricks, etc) to build another bedroom for their improved comfort. 

This is his fourth loan through Impro (Kiva Field Partner) and the second through Kiva. Following a study of his income and his expenses it was concluded that he is eligible for a loan. In addition, his payment history with Impro has been good.

loans.use: To build a bedroom in their home.

loans.name: Herminda Del Carmen

texts.es:
Herminda, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, es madre soltera y vive con sus hijos y tres nietos, de 8, 10 y 12 años de edad, ella se dedica a vender tortillas desde hace nueve años y medio, lo inicio por la misma necesidad de proveer la alimentación a sus hijos.
Ella por el momento esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz y leña, con esta ayuda podrá realizar al compra de la materia prima y de esta manera poder seguir trabajando por el bienestar de su hogar.
El objetivo de Herminda es mantenerse en el negocio, hacerlo crecer para continuar generando ingresos y poder apoyar a sus hijos y nietos.
texts.en:
Herminda lives in San Rafael Oriente, in the department of San Miguel. She is a single mother and she lives with her children and her three grandchildren aged 8 10, and 12 years old. She has been selling tortillas for the past 9 and half years. She started the business to be able to feed her children. 

Currently she requests a loan to purchase corn and firewood. With this support she will be able to purchase ingredients to keep working for the good of her home. 

Herminda's goal is to maintain her business and to make it grow and to keep generating an income to support her children and grandchildren.

loans.use: To purchase corn and firewood.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Rugiatu

texts.en: This is 40 year-old Rugiatu K.. She is married and has 6 children ages 2, 4, 6, 12, 15 and 18. In 1995, Rugiatu established her food items business where she sells ground nuts, ginger, pepper, etc. She began her business as way of improving her livelihood. Working six days a week and six hours a day, she earns about Le 550,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000 in order to purchase more assorted local food items. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 250,000. In the future, Rugiatu plans to help her husband build a house, educate their children to university level and open a shop. She is honest and hard working and thanks you for your support
