loans.name: Estanislao

texts.es:
El señor Estanislao vive en anticretico con su esposa e hijos en la zona de llojeta de la ciudad de La Paz; de profesión informático, la actividad que realiza es el mantenimiento de computadoras, tiene un servicio de  Internet en su domicilio con el cual genera sus ingresos para mantener a su familia.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar Cds, memorias, tarjetas de computadora para tener un stock para su negocio.

Es cliente de Impro y paga muy bien por lo tanto puede acceder aun nuevo crédito.
texts.en:
Mr Estanislao lives in Anticretico with his wife and children, in the Llojeta zone of the city of La Paz. By trade a computer specialist, he works in computer maintenance. He has an internet service in his home with which he generates an income to support his family.

He is requesting this loan for the purchase of cd's, memory cards and computer cards in order to have stock for his business.

He is an Impro client and repays very well, and so he has been able to access a new loan.

loans.use: the purchase of cd's, memory cards, and computer cards for his computer maintenance business.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is currently in business selling coffee and sugar.  She is 30 years old, married to a seller of soap, and has 6 children.  Three of them go to school.  Jane has requested a loan to stock more coffee and sugar.  With extra profits, Jane hopes to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: Stock more coffee and sugar

loans.name: Charles Mwameso

texts.en:
Charles Mwameso M. is a 55-year-old man. He is married to Ethiel, and they have been blessed with three children. Charles has been a retail shop owner for the last eight months as a primary business and also sells clothing materials.

This is his second loan from KADET LTD, and he plans to purchase cooking oil, salt, sugar, rice, and flour. The anticipated profits will be directed into the expansion of his business.

His dream is to own his business premises.

loans.use: To purchase cooking oil, salt, sugar, rice, and flour.

loans.name: Dauda

texts.en: This is 36 year-old Dauda K.. He is married and has a seven-year-old child. In 2005, Dauda established his rice business. He began his business in order to support his family. Working six days a week and six hours a day, Dauda earns about Le 250,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000. in order to increase his stock. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000. In the future, Dauda plans to promote his business by opening another shop and hiring employees. Dauda is serious and dedicated to his business and thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy additional rice for his store.

loans.name: Jamal

texts.ar:
جمال في عمر 30 سنة يعمل في محل لبيع قطع السيارات المستعملة والجديدة له في عمله 10 سنوات متزوج وله ولدان يحب عمله
يريد دائما التجديد في العمل هو طموح مثابر يسعى الى التطور والتقدم يريد تأمين العيش الكريم له ولعائلته له تاريخ جيد
وكان يلقى دائما الدعم المعنوي والمادي يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة الى تقوية المصلحة وشراء معدات جديدة وبضائع
texts.en: Jamal is a 30-year-old husband and father of two who strives to secure a dignified life for his family and who in turn is showered with their moral and physical support. Jamal has ten years of experience selling parts for new and used automobiles. He is very gung ho about his work and is always trying to improve. Given his good standing with Al Majmoua, Jamal wanted to apply for another loan to purchase new equipment and merchandise for his business.

loans.use: To purchase spare car parts for reselling

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more used clothing for her stall.

loans.name: Dora Clemencia

texts.es:
Dora Clemencia R. C., tiene 42 años, vive en unión libre con su conviviente, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 7 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

Dora se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es ayudar a los hijos en los estudios.

Le gusta ver la televisión.
texts.en:
Dora Clemencia R. C. is 42 years old, she lives in a common-law marriage with her partner in Ventanas, a canton of the Los Ríos Province. She has 7 children.

The V.R.C. Valle Alto (Valle Alto Communal Bank) is located in the Voluntad de Dios precinct, located in the Ventanas canton; this group engages in short-cycle agricultural labor, growing crops like maize and rice.

Dora engages in agriculture, growing maize and rice. She buys and sells the products in Ventanas and in the Comercial Peña, and she also sells them every day at her house or in the market.

The loan she is requesting will be used to sow maize and rice by buying supplies and seeds. The loan will help her economically, as thanks to it she will fulfill her needs, as well as face challenges such as pests, illnesses and climate changes. She dreams of helping her children with their studies.

She likes watching television.

loans.use: To buy supplies and seeds.

loans.name: Ruth Mbithe

texts.en:
Ruth Mbithe N. is a 42-year-old woman from Jomvu. She is married to Zacharia and they have four children. Ruth has been a retail shop owner for the last sixteen years.  

This is her first loan from KADET, and she plans to use it to purchase salt, cereals, flour, sugar and rice. The anticipated profits have been directed into the expansion of her business. Ruth's dream is to succeed through KADET.

loans.use: to purchase salt, cereals, flour, sugar and rice

loans.name: Yuris Mabel

texts.es:
Yuris, de 21 años de edad, reside en Yoloaiquin departamento de Morazán, donde vive con su esposo y su hijo de un año de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de refrescos, pues desde niña le ayudaba a su madre a preparar refrescos y venderlos así que hoy que tiene su propio hogar no se le hiso difícil encontrar un negocio para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, su venta la realiza en los buses y carros que viajan con personas con un horario de 9:00am  a 5:00pm.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo el cual utilizara para la compra de materiales para refrescos como frutas, bolsas plásticas, azúcar, comprara también gatorade, sodas y agua, también utilizara una parte para pagar un abogado que le ayude a escriturar la casa donde vive actualmente.
Con este préstamo se beneficiara doblemente por una parte su negocio con la inversión, en lo personal pues podrá comenzar el proceso de escrituración para tener más seguridad del ligar donde reside, Su sueño es ver a su hijo crecer sano y poder darle lo mejor para que se desarrolle correctamente, también tiene la esperanza de seguir con el trabajo en busca de crecimiento económico.
texts.en:
Yuris, age 21, lives in Yoloaiquin in the Morazan department with her husband and one-year-old child. She sells drinks, since she helped her mother to prepare and sell drinks as a child. Now that she has her own home, it was not hard for her to find a business to help her husband with the household costs. She makes her sales to buses and cars which travel between 9:00 am and 5:00 pm.

She is requesting this loan for the purchase of materials for drinks, such as fruits, plastic bags, and sugar. She will also purchase Gatorade, sodas and water. She will also use part of the loan to pay a lawyer to help her to register the home where she currently lives.

This loan will benefit her twice; on one hand, the investment will help her business. On the personal level, she will be able to start the registration process in order to have more security in her home.

Her dream is to see her child grow healthily, and to be able to give him the best for his proper development. She also hopes to continue working in search of economic growth.

loans.use: the purchase of drinks and ingredients for natural drinks.

loans.name: Gladys Azucena

texts.es:
Gladys Azucena Z. V., tiene 38 años, es soltera con su hijo, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

Gladys se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una finca.

Le gusta conversar con las amigas y escuchar música.
texts.en:
Gladys Azucena Z. V. is 38 years old, she is single and lives with her son in Ventanas, a caonton in the Los Ríos Province. She has one son.

The V.R.C. Valle Alto (Valle Alto Communal Bank) is located in the Voluntad de Dios precinct, located in the Ventanas canton; this group engages in short-cycle agricultural labor, growing crops like maize and rice.

Gladys engages in agriculture, growing maize and rice. She buys and sells the products in Ventanas and in the Comercial Peña, and she also sells them every day at her house or in the market.

The loan she is requesting will be used to sow maize and rice by buying supplies and seeds. The loan will help her economically, as thanks to it she will fulfill her needs, as well as face challenges such as pests, illnesses and climate changes. She dreams of buying a farm.

She likes chatting with her female friends and listening to music.

loans.use: To buy supplies and seeds.

loans.name: Nadia

texts.ar:
ناديا متزوجة ولها ولدان تعمل في محل لبيع الاكسسورات والفوبيجو لها في عملها 3 سنوات تحب عملها وتتطور به دائما
تحب عائلتها وهي التي تعيل اولادها تريد لهم التعلم والتطور في المجتمع والمال ولها هوايات عديدة من تنسيق للزهور وتنسيق
اعراس وغيره تريد تطوير نفسها وعائلته وعملها كان للقرض السابق تأثير ايجابي عليها تريد من خلال طلب قرض لها من المجموعة
الى شراء زهور والوان للرسم على الزجاج فهي طموحة ومتطورة لها زبائن من محيطها وجيرانها تتلقى الدعم الكامل من عائلتها
texts.en: Nadia is a wife and breadwinner for her two children who strives to provide them with a good education and the means for upward sociA. mobility. She has been a saleswoman for feminine accessories and imitation jewelry for the past three years, her customers hailing from her neighbors and other townsmen. She enjoys her work which she is always interested in further developing. Outside of her professionA. life, Nadia preoccupies herself with severA. hobbies, such as flower arranging and wedding planning. Given that her last loan had a very positive effect, Nadia was now interested in seeking another loan from A. Majmoua to purchase flowers and paints for use on glass.

loans.use: To purchase flowers and paints for use on glass

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en: This is 29 year-old Fatmata C.. She is married and has two children, ages four and seven. In 2000, Fatmata C. established her cooking utensils business. She began her business because she wanted to help her husband support their family. Working six days a week and six hours a day, she earns about Le 300,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000 in order to buy more assorted food. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 500,000. In the future, Fatmata plans to open a bigger shop in order to sell wholesale to other traders and she would like to hire sales people. Fatmata is very determined and thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more assorted food.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
Maria Magdalena A. A., tiene 38 años, es soltera con los hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

Maria Magdalena se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una casa para los hijos.

Le gusta cocinar.
texts.en:
Maria Magdalena A. A. is 38 years old, she is single and she lives with her children in Ventanas, a canton of the Los Ríos Province. She has 3 children.

The V.R.C. Valle Alto (Valle Alto Communal Bank) is located in the Voluntad de Dios precinct, located in the Ventanas canton; this group engages in short-cycle agricultural labor, growing crops like maize and rice.

Maria Magdalena engages in agriculture, growing maize and rice. She buys and sells the products in Ventanas and in the Comercial Peña, and she also sells them every day at her house or in the market.

The loan she is requesting will be used to sow maize by buying supplies and seeds. The loan will help her economically, as thanks to it she will fulfill her needs, as well as face challenges such as pests, illnesses and climate changes. She dreams of buying a house for her children.

She likes cooking.

loans.use: To buy supplies and seeds.

loans.name: Bentina

texts.en:
Bentina Cheserm is a 26 and the married mother of three children. She lives with her family in Irong in the outskirts of Eldoret town. Bentina packages, transports, and sells milk. Her husband helps in her business by transporting the packaged milk to their customers. Bentina has been in this business for four years and earns a monthly income of 18,000 shillings.

This will be Bentina’s first loan from KADET LTD. She will use the entire loan to buy milk packing containers and to buy milk for resale. In the future, Bentina wants to improve her family’s standard of living. She also wants to become a better milk seller.

loans.use: to purchase containers and buy milk

loans.name: Verónica Mercedes

texts.es:
Verónica Mercedes C. F., tiene 26 años, es soltera con los hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

Verónica se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una casa.

Le gusta reunirse con las vecinas.
texts.en:
Verónica Mercedes C. F. is 26 years old, she is single and she lives with her children in Ventanas, a canton of the Los Ríos Province. She has 3 children.

The V.R.C. Valle Alto (Valle Alto Communal Bank) is located in the Voluntad de Dios precinct, located in the Ventanas canton; this group engages in short-cycle agricultural labor, growing crops like maize and rice.

Verónica engages in agriculture, growing maize and rice. She buys and sells the products in Ventanas and in the Comercial Peña, and she also sells them every day at her house or in the market.

The loan she is requesting will be used to sow maize by buying supplies and seeds. The loan will help her economically, as thanks to it she will fulfill her needs, as well as face challenges such as pests, illnesses and climate changes. She dreams of buying a house.

She likes getting together with her neighbors.

loans.use: To buy supplies and seeds.

loans.name: Anne Atabo

texts.en:
Anne Atabo E. is 37 years old and married to Albert Ekidor, who is a businessman. They are blessed with three children ages 8, 10 and 15. They live in Lodwar, Kenya.

Anne operates a food kiosk and she has been in this business for the past three years earning an income of KES 8,000 per month. She was introduced to Kiva's partner, KADET LTD, by a friend and she is applying for her second loan of KES 30,000. With this loan she plans to buy hotel utensils and food stuffs in order to provide a better quality service for her clients.

Anne hopes to operate a big hotel in Lodwar town, and in the future to extend the same services to the city center.

loans.use: To buy hotel utensils and food stuffs for sale

loans.name: Gloria Cecibel

texts.es:
Gloria de 33 años de edad, reside en Delicias de Concepción departamento de Morazán, vive con sus padres y hermanos, ella está soltera y se dedica al comercio en una tienda y chalet, este negocio consiste en vender panes con pollo, pupusas, refrescos y golosinas como galletas, dulces y boquitas, lo administra desde hace 3 años lo tiene ubicado en la escuela del lugar donde reside.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para surtir la tienda en época de clases, ya que se acerca el tiempo de regresar a la escuela y ella debe estar preparada para comenzar con el chalet bien diversificado en mercadería.
Sus objetivos son seguir este nuevo año proveyendo para los estudiantes todo lo que sea necesario para alimentarse en sus recreos, en su vida personal quiere ahorrar para poseer su propia vivienda y formar su familia.
texts.en:
Gloria is 33 years old and she lives in Delicias de Conception in the department of Morazan.  She lives with her parents and siblings. She is single and she is a merchant who owns a store and a food stall. Through this business she sells chicken sandwiches, pupusas, drinks and snacks, including cookies, sweets, and finger foods. She has had the business for 3 years and it is located in a school in the neighborhood where she lives. 

She requests a loan to purchase merchandise to supply her food stall for the school year. Back to school is soon to come and she wants to be ready to have her store well supplied.

Her goal for this New Year is to keep providing the students with snacks during their recess times. As for her personal life, she wants to save enough money to have her own store and to have a family of her own.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise such as cookies, snacks, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Victor Manuel A. A., tiene 37 años, es soltero con la madre, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

Victor se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un carro, casa e ir a la playa.

Le gusta jugar indor, conversar con los amigos.
texts.en:
Victor Manuel A. A. is 37 years old, he is single and lives with his mother and his children in Ventanas, a canton of the Los Ríos province. He has 2 children.

The V.R.C. Valle Alto (Valle Alto Communal Bank) is located in the Voluntad de Dios precinct, located in the Ventanas canton; this group engages in short-cycle agricultural labor, growing crops like maize and rice.

Victor engages in agriculture, growing maize and rice. He buys and sells the products in Ventanas and in the Comercial Peña, and he also sells them every day at his house or in the market.

The loan he is requesting will be used to sow maize by buying supplies and seeds. The loan will help him economically, as thanks to it he will fulfill his needs, as well as face challenges such as pests, illnesses and climate changes. He dreams of buying a car, a house and of going to the beach.

He likes playing indoor sports and chatting with his friends.

loans.use: To buy supplies and seeds.

loans.name: Maria Narcisa

texts.es:
Maria Narcisa C. A., tiene 31 años, es soltera con los hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

Maria se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es ver el bienestar de los hijos.

Le gusta ver televisión.
texts.en:
Maria Narcisa C. A., age 31, is single and lives with her children in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province. She has 3 children.

The members of the V.R.C. Valle Alto are located in the Voluntad de Dios district, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, sowing corn and rice.

Maria works in agriculture sowing corn and rice. She buys and sells her products in stalls in the Peña market and sells every day from home or at the market.

She is requesting this loan for sowing corn and purchasing supplies and seeds. The support of this loan will help her economically to supply her needs. She confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. Her dream is to secure her children's well-being.

She enjoys watching television.

loans.use: the purchase of supplies and seeds

loans.name: Lobwin Alany

texts.en:
Lobwin Alany B. is 33 years old and married to John Albert Ekidor, who is a businessman. They are blessed with three children ages 1, 4 and 6. They live in Lodwar, Kenya.

Lobwin operates a food kiosk and she has been in this business for the past three years earning an income of KES 9,000 per month. Lobwin was introduced to Kiva's partner, KADET LTD, by a friend and she is applying for her first loan of KES 30,000. With this loan she plans to buy two bales of flour, cooking oil and food stuffs in order to provide a better quality service to her clients.

Lobwin hopes to operate a big hotel in Lodwar town, and in the future to extend the same services to the city center.

loans.use: To buy two bales of flour, cooking oil and food stuffs

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
Don Juan de 51 años de edad, vive con su esposa y cuatro hijos de 20, 17, 12 y 10 años de edad, residen en Lolotiquillo departamento de Morazán,  se dedica a la fabricación de artesanías, su trabajo específicamente es fabricar faldones de montura de caballos, yaguales y petates, estos últimos son hechos con tule, estos son los productos que comercializa dedicándose a tiempo completo.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materia prima para mantenerse activo con su fabricación de productos, la compra seria en tule y cuero, de esta manera contar con lo necesario para realizar los trabajos.
Sus propósitos son trabajar para mejorar su vivienda y apoyar a sus hijos en los estudios.
texts.en:
Mr Juan, age 51, lives with his wife and four children ages 20, 17, 12 y 10. They live in Lolotiquillo, in the Morazán department. He makes crafts. Specifically, he makes saddles, woven rings and bedrolls. He makes the bedrolls from reeds. This is a full-time business.

He is requesting this loan for the purchase of basic materials to keep making his products. He will purchase reeds and leather in order to have the necessary items to do his work.

He intends to work in order to improve his home and to support his children with their studies.

loans.use: the purchase of reeds and leather

loans.name: Luís Alberto

texts.es:
Luís Alberto C. E., tiene 30 años, es soltero vive con la hija, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

Luis se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una finca.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Luís Alberto C. E., age 30, is single and lives with his daughter in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province. He has one child.

The members of the V.R.C. Valle Alto are located in the Voluntad de Dios district, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. The members of this group work in short-cycle agriculture sowing corn and rice.

Luis works in agriculture, sowing corn and rice. He buys and sells his products in stalls in the Peña market and sells them every day from home or in the market.

He is requesting this loan for sowing corn and buying supplies and seeds. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to buy a farm.

He enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: the purchase of supplies and seeds

loans.name: Alejandrina Pilar

texts.es: Alejandrina Pilar
texts.en:
Alejandrina Pilar Alvarez A. is 48 years old, she is single and she lives with her children in the canton of Ventanas, in the province of Los Rios. She has 2 children. 

The communal bank named "High Plains" is located in the neighborhood of Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas. The members of this group are short-term agriculturists who plant corn and rice. 

Alejandrina is an agriculturist who plants corn and rice. She purchases her products in Ventanas, in the Pena shopping district, and she resells from her home or in the market in Ventanas every day.

She requests a loan to purchase corn, products and seeds. With the help of this loan she will be able to financially meet all of her needs, and to face the difficult challenges presented by plagues, illness, and the changing weather. Her dream is to have her own fields to work in.

She enjoys doing housework.

loans.use: To purchase products and seeds.

loans.name: Ociel Exides

texts.es:
Ociel, de 31 años de edad, reside en Chilanga departamento de Morazán, vive con su esposa y su primera hija de cuatro meses, se dedica a la Jarcia, este negocio consiste en elaborar lazos y hamacas de productos sintéticos y de henequén, esta actividad fue inculcada por sus padres desde que estaba pequeño sin embargo él solo lleva un año de dedicarse al negocio para proveer a su esposa e hija lo necesario para el diario vivir.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales para elaborar hamacas y lazos, con esta compra tendrá a su disposición materiales para fabricas lazos y hamacas para los clientes que le hacen pedidos,  aparte de que siempre está dedicado a hacer estos productos por los imprevistos para aprovechar cualquier posible venta.
Su proyección es ser un gran productor para estabilizar ingresos que le ayuden a ir desarrollándose como persona y comerciante, también mejorar las condiciones de su casa y ahorrar para estar preparado velando por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Ociel, age 31, lives in Chilanga in the Morazan department. He lives with his wife and their first daughter, who is four months old. Ociel works with rope. This business consists of making ropes and hammocks from synthetic products and plant fibers. His parents started this business when he was young, though he has only been doing this for one year in order to provide his wife and daughter with their daily bread.

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of materials for making hammocks and ropes. With this purchase he will have materials at his disposition for making ropes and hammocks for his customers who are making orders. He always wants to keep making these products in order to take advantage of any possible sale.

He hopes to be a large producer in order to stabilize the income that allows him to continue developing as a person and a merchant. He also wants to improve his home and save up for his family's well-being.

loans.use: the purchase of materials for making hammocks and ropes

loans.name: Yimmy Geovanny

texts.es:
Yimmy Geovanny C. F., tiene 20 años, es soltero con los padres, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No Tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

Yimmy se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar casa y tener un futuro mejor.

Le gusta hacer deporte y estudiar.
texts.en:
Yimmy Geovanny C. F. is 20 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the canton of Ventanas, in the Los Ríos Province. He doesn’t have any children.

He is a member of the Valle Alto Communal Bank, which is located in the Voluntad de Dios precint, part of the canton of Ventanas. This communal bank works in short cycle agriculture planting corn and rice.

Yimmy works in agriculture, planting corn and rice. He buys and sells the products in Ventanas in the Peña shopping center and sells them every day from home or at the Ventanas market.

He is requesting the loan to plant corn and purchase supplies and seeds. The loan support will help him financially to meet his needs. He faces challenges such as pests and diseases, as well as the variation in climate. His dream is to buy a house and to have a better future.

He likes playing sports and studying.

loans.use: Purchase of supplies and seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: investment capital-the purchase of a new computer

loans.name: Livingston Javier

texts.es:
Livingston Javier A. R., tiene 20 años, es soltero vive con los padres, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No Tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

Livingston se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es salir adelante y tener mejor calidad de vida.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Livingston Javier A. R. is 20 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the canton of Ventanas, part of the Los Ríos Province.

He is a member of the Valle Alto Communal Bank, which is located in the Voluntad de Dios precint, part of the canton of Ventanas. This communal bank works in short cycle agriculture planting corn and rice.

Livingston works in agriculture, planting corn and rice. He buys and sells the products in Ventanas in the Peña market and sells them every day from home or at the Ventanas market.

He is requesting the loan to plant corn and purchase supplies and seeds. The loan support will help him financially to meet his needs. He faces challenges such as pests and diseases, as well as the variation in climate. His dream is to get ahead and to have a better quality of life.

He likes playing sports.

loans.use: Purchase of supplies and seeds

loans.name: Glenda Yadira

texts.es:
Glenda Yadira A. C., tiene 31 años, es soltera vive con los padres y los hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

Glenda se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una casa.

Le gusta mirar la televisión.
texts.en:
Glenda Yadira A. C. is 31 years old. She is single and lives with her parents and children in the Ventanas canton in Los Rios province. She has two children.

The members of Valle Alto Communal Bank live in the precincts of Voluntad de Dios, within the Ventanas canton. This communal bank’s members work in short cycle agricultural work, planting corn and rice.

Glenda works in agriculture, planting corn and rice. She buys and sells her products at the Peña market in Ventanas. She sells from home or at the Ventanas market every day.

Glenda is applying for this loan in order to plant corn: to buy input materials and seeds. The support of this loan will help her economically to provide for her needs. She faces challenges like pest infestations, illnesses and climate variation. Her dream is to buy a home.

She likes to watch television.

loans.use: Purchase of input materials and seeds

loans.name: Reina Marisel

texts.es:
Reina, de 35 años de edad, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazán, vive con su hijo Marco Antonio de 16 años de edad, es madre soltera y alquila vivienda, ella se dedica a la venta de pan dulce, este negocio consiste en trabajar para una panadería y vender el pan en un punto de comercio además vende refrescos y prendas de fantasía desde hace 15 años.
Ella quiere surtir el negocio de fantasía (prendas bañadas en oro) y bebidas refrescantes con la intención de mantenerse activa en el negocio aunque para llevarlo a cabo solicita un préstamo que le ayude a comprar toda la mercadería necesaria para fortalecer el negocio.
Su sueño es tener el negocio grande y con suficiente mercadería para ofrecer a los clientes, en la búsqueda de ingresos estables para poder algún día tener casa propia donde pueda vivir con su hijo en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Reina is 35 years old; she lives in San Francisco Gotera, in the department of Morazan. She lives with her son Marco Antonio who is 16 years old. She is a single mother and she rents their home. She sells pastries, a business that is involved in working in a bakery and selling the products. She also sells soft drinks and costume jewelry, a business she has had for 15 years. 

She would like to supply her inventory of costume jewelry (gold plated items) and to purchase refreshing soft drinks with the goal of keeping up an active business. She requests a loan to purchase the merchandise she needs to strengthen her business. 

Her dream is to have a large business with plenty of items to offer her clients. Her goal is to have a steady income in order to have a house of her own where she can live together with her son, in greater comfort.

loans.use: Compra de prendas Joyeria

loans.name: Yesenia Guadalupe

texts.es:
Yesenia, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposo, su padre y dos hijos de 5 y 2 años de edad, ella se dedica a vender lociones y cosméticos, este negocio fue por iniciativa propia junto a su esposo desde hace 5 años, iniciando con venta de medicina popular y lociones, pero actualmente solo vende lociones y cosméticos, con un horario de 7:00am a 4:00pm, saliendo a visitar a los clientes y vecinos cercanos.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar lociones y cosméticos, con esta compra ella pretende aumentar el número de productos para ofrecer a los clientes, ya que de esta forma podrá vender nuevos productos y generar ingresos para solventar necesidades en su hogar.
Su objetivo es fortalecer el negocio, contar con suficientes productos para poder diversificar las ventas ya que los clientes demandan nuevos productos que debe mantener en su inventario para poder vender, con su familia ella espera que a través de su buen desempeño en el trabajo ellos sean beneficiados con mayores comodidades económicas.
texts.en:
Yesenia lives in the city of San Miguel, in the department of San Miguel. She lives together with her husband, her father, and two children, aged 5 and 2. She sells skin lotions and cosmetics. She started this business in partnership with her husband 5 years ago. They started out selling popular medicines and lotions, but now they only sell lotions and cosmetics.  They work from 7:00am to 4:00pm, going out to visit their clients and nearby neighbors.

She requests a loan to purchase lotions and cosmetics. With this purchase she will increase the inventory of products to sell to her clients. She will be able to sell new products and generate more income and meet the household expenses. 

Her goal is to strengthen her business, to have enough inventory to add variety to her sales. Her clients request new products and she needs to maintain her inventory in order to sell. As for her family, she hopes that her hard work will benefit them with greater financial stability.

loans.use: To purchase lotions and cosmetics.

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es:
la señora Karla Patricia M. tiene 29 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene dos hijos, Karla se a dedicado a trabajar muy fuerte para sacar adelante a sus hijos, posee casa propia y tiene mas de cinco años de vivir en ese lugar.
el credito lo utilizara para compra de ropa interior, cosmeticos y el resto en abarroteria para su pulperia.
su meta es darles una buena educacion a sus hijos.
dice sentirse muy feliz ya que su negocio esta creciendo y espera poder tenerlo bien surtido y mas grande.
las ganancias las necesita para cubrir los gastos del hogar y para la alimentacion de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Karla Patricia M. is 29 years old, she is a single mother and she has 2 children. Karla has worked very hard to provide for her children. She has her own home and she has more than 5 years living in the same place. 

The loan will be used to purchase undergarments, cosmetics, and inventory for her convenience store. 

Her goal is to send her children to school. 

She says that she is very happy to have seen her business grow and she hopes to keep a good quantity and variety in her inventory.

She needs her earnings to cover the household expenses and to feed her children.

loans.use: To purchase grocery store merchandise and cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buying shelves to display her merchandise

loans.name: Angela Lastenia

texts.es:
Angela Lastenia B. A., tiene 28 años, es soltera vive con los padres y los hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 4 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

Angela se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno para seguir trabajando y ayudar a los hijos para que tengan el estudio.

Le gusta mirar la televisión y limpiar la casa.
texts.en:
Angela Lastenia B. A. is 28 years old, she is single and she lives with her parents and her children. They live in the city of Ventanas, in the Los Rios province. She has 4 children. 

The members of the communal bank named "Valle Alto, are originally from the Voluntad de Dios community in Ventanas. This group is primarily involved in short-cycle agriculture, such as corn and rice. 

Angela is an agriculturist who plants corn and rice. She buys and sells the products in the Pena market in Ventanas, and she resells them from her home or in the Ventanas market every day.

She requests a loan to be able to sow corn, to purchase products and seeds. With the help of this loan she will be able to provide for her needs, and to face challenges such as plagues, illness, and the changing weather. Her dream is to purchase land to up her work and to keep her children in school. 

She enjoys watching television and to do housework.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural materials and seeds.

loans.name: German

texts.es:
El señor German vive en casa de sus padres con su esposa e hijos en la zona de Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz; de profesión sastre, pero actualmente trabaja como chofer asalariado con un minibús de su padre.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar llantas ya que las que actualmente tiene están en mal estado y para continuar trabajando necesita que estén bien.
Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito de Impro, y el análisis socio económico lo califican para ser sujeto de crédito.
texts.en:
Mr German lives in his parents' home with his wife and children in the Tembladerani zone, in the city of La Paz. He is a tailor by trade, but currently works as the paid driver of his father's minibus.

The requested loan is for the purchase of tires, as his current tires are in bad condition. In order to continue working, he needs them to be in good condition. This is his first loan from Impro, and the socio-economic analysis has concluded that he can receive a loan.

loans.use: the purchase of tires for his minibus in which he transports passengers.

loans.name: Carmen Pilar

texts.es:
Carmen Pilar B. A., tiene 24 años, es soltera, vive sola en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No Tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

Carmen se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una casa y un carro.

Le gusta ver televisión y escuchar música.
texts.en:
Carmen Pilar B. A. is 24 years old, she is single, and she lives alone in the city of Ventanas, in the Los Rios Province. She doesn't have children. 

The members of the communal bank named "Valle Alto, are originally from the Voluntad de Dios community in Ventanas. This group is primarily involved in short-cycle agriculture, such as corn and rice. 

Carmen is an agriculturist and she sows corns and rice. She buys and sells her products in the Pena market in Ventanas, and she also sells from her home and in the market in Ventanas every day.

She requests a loan to sow corn, to purchase products and seeds. With the support of this loan she will be able to provide for her needs, and to face challenges such as plagues, illness, and the changing weather. Her dream is to purchase a house and a car. 

She enjoys watching television and listening to music.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural products and seeds.

loans.name: Abida's Group

texts.en:
Abida is a resident of Kamoki, which is a small industrial city of Pakistan. She has been living there with her family in a 2 room brick house for over 18 years.  Her father-in-law also lives with her and runs a construction supply business. 
Abida herself is a very active lady.   Besides her household work, she shares the financial burden with her husband by operating a small beauty salon at home. She generates income by offering regular makeup, bridal makeup and other beauty-related services to her customers.
She is a mother of 3 children: two sons and a daughter. All of them are enrolled in school and getting their education. 
Abida has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, for the improvement of her beauty salon business. With the loan, she will purchase beauty products such as creams, hair gels and face masks and make-up items (mascara, eye shadow and base), etc., to offer better services to her clients. 
She is hopeful that through this investment she will give her parlor a new look and be able to draw many more customers.  
She is a regular loan user of Asasah, and this is her 4th loan application. In previous loan years, she has maintained a good credit behavior and never missed any meeting. 
Note: “In the photo, the lady with a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Abida”.

loans.use: To buy beauty products and make up items for beauty salon

loans.name: Felipe Santiago

texts.es: Felipe hombre emprendedor con su esposa apoyándolo han logrado ir mejorando su vivienda le falta algunas mejorar pero están seguro que llegaran a lograr una mejor infraestructura.  De profesión Ebanista creó su propio negocio iniciándolo con apoyo de su hermano y esposa en la trayectoria se le presentado dificultades con la falta de financiamiento para invertir en el negocio. Ahora gracias al financiamiento que le hemos ofrecido ha logrado construir unas de la parte de su vivienda. El préstamo que solicitad es para invertirlo en el negocio en la compra de maderas e insumos necesario para seguir creciendo y generando ganancia para mejor su nivel de vida.
texts.en: Felipe is an enterprising man who, with his wife's support, has been improving their home. There are some improvements left to do but he is certain to achieve a better condition for their house. By profession he is a carpenter and he formed his own business with his brother's and wife’s support. He is facing some challenges now because he doesn't have the funds he needs to invest in the business. Thanks to the loan we have offered him he has been able to build a section in their home. The loan requested will be used to invest in the business with the purchase of wood and materials he needs to develop his business and to generate an income to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase wood and other carpentry materials.

loans.name: Jenny

texts.es:
La señora Jenny vive en casa alquilada con sus hijos en la zona 14 de septiembre de la ciudad de La Paz; trabaja como secretaria en el ministerio de trabajo donde percibe un sueldo que no es muy alto, por tal razón ella se dedica a la venta de calzados, ropa, cosméticos, etc. El crédito que solicita es para aumentar su capital, comprar más calzados, ropa y cosméticos  y de esta manera mantener estable su negocio.

Esta es la primera vez que solicita un crédito de Impro. El análisis socio económico indica que es sujeto de crédito.
texts.en:
Mrs Jenny lives in a rented home with her children in the 14 de Septiembre zone of the city of La Paz. She works as a secretary in the Ministry of Labour, where she receives a salary that is not very high. This is why she sells shoes, clothing, cosmetics, etc. The requested loan is to increase her capital, buying more shoes, clothing and cosmetics. This way, she will be able to keep her business stable.

This is her first loan from Impro. The socio-economic analysis indicates that she can receive a loan.

loans.use: the purchase of more shoes, clothing and cosmetics for her business in which she sells these items.

loans.name: José Manuel

texts.es:
José Manuel P. A., tiene 21 años, es soltero, vive con los padres en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No Tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

José se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una casa.

Le gusta estudiar la Biblia.
texts.en:
Jose Manuel P. A. is 21 years old, he is single, and he lives with his parents in the city of Ventanas, in the Los Rios province. He doesn't have children. 

The members of the communal bank named "Valle Alto, are originally from the Voluntad de Dios community in Ventanas. This group is primarily involved in short-cycle agriculture, such as corn and rice. 

Jose is an agriculturist who sows corn and rice. He buys and sells his products from the Pena market in Ventanas and he makes his sales from home or in the market in Ventanas every day. 

He requests a loan to sow corn, to purchase materials and seeds. With the support of this loan he will be able to provide for his needs, and to face challenges such as plagues, illness, and the changing weather. His dream is to purchase a house of his own. 

He enjoys studying the Bible.

loans.use: To purchas agricultural products and seeds.

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
Sergio vive en la zona de Villa Fátima sector Barrio Grafico de la ciudad de La Paz. 
Se dedica a la distribución de perfumes y cosméticos en la empresa de su madre.
Es soltero y no tiene hijos.
El crédito será destinado para el pago de pensiones en la universidad privada de Bolivia.
Es la tercera vez que solicita un crédito en Impro, su historial lo califica como cliente 1 es decir con cumplimiento bueno en el pago de su crédito.
texts.en:
Sergio lives in the Villa Fatima zone, in the Barrio Grafico sector of the city of La Paz.
He distributes perfumes and cosmetics in his mother's business.
He is single and has no children.
This loan will be used to pay tuition in the Universidad Privada de Bolivia.
This is his third loan with Impro. His record qualifies him as Client 1; that is to say, he repays his loans on time.

loans.use: to pay tuition in the university where he studies.

loans.name: Jose Damian

texts.es:
José Damián, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, donde vive con esposa, ellos aun no tienen hijos, José tiene 25 años  de edad, se dedica a la crianza de ganado y cultivo de maíz, su horario de trabajo es de 6:00am a 5:00pm todos los días de la semana, su oficio permanente es la ganadería ya que los cultivos los realiza solo para la temporada de sembrar.
Él actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de tres terneros, que valen $150.00 cada uno, su compra es con el objetivo de crecerlos y engordarlos para dentro de algún tiempo poder venderlos a buen precio, esta inversión le ayudara a tener dentro de algún tiempo una ganancia producto de la venta de estos terneros que comprara.
Las aspiraciones de José Damián son continuar con este negocio de ganado, multiplicándolo sus ganancias para sacar a delante a su familia con una condición estable.
texts.en:
José Damián lives with his wife in San Rafael Oriente, in the San Miguel department. They do not have any children. Jose is 25 and raises livestock and grows corn. His work schedule is from 6:00 am - 5:00 pm, every day of the week. His permanent job is ranching, since he only grows crops during sowing season.
He is requesting a loan for the purchase of three calves, which are worth $150.00 each. In this purchase, his goal is to grow and fatten them in order to sell them for a good price. This investment will help him to make a profit from the sale of these calves.
His dreams are to continue with this livestock business, multiplying his earnings in order to get his family ahead with stable conditions.

loans.use: the purchase of three calves

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es:
Doña Ana, tiene 58 años  D. edad, resiD. en Chinameca departamento D. San Miguel, donD. vive con su esposo y tres hijos D. 32, 28 y 23 años D. edad, D. estos solo dos dependen aun D. sus ingresos económicos, ella se dedica a la venta D. comida desD. hace 15 años en el mercado municipal D. Chinameca, donD. trabaja D. lunes a sábado, este negocio es la mayor fuente D. ingreso con la que cuenta su familia.
Ella actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. materiales para preparar los alimentos, tomates, maíz, condimentos, carnes, verduras y refrescos, este préstamo le ayudara a su negocio para ser más competente y dar abasto a la demanda D. comida que presenta, así mismo le dará mayor seguridad económica para cubrir las necesidades y gastos familiares.
Sus aspiraciones son con respecto al negocio, tener las condiciones adecuadas para atender a los clientes D. la mejor manera, ofrecerles los platillos favoritos dando gusto a sus demandas, también desea ver que sus hijos culminen sus estudios universitarios.
texts.en:
Mrs Ana, age 58, lives in Chinameca, in the San Miguel department, with her husband and three children ages 32, 28 and 23. Only two of her children still depend on her income. She has sold food for 15 years in the Chinameca municipal market, where she works from Mondays to Saturdays. This business is the main source of income for her family.
She is requesting a loan for the purchase of materials to prepare her food: tomatoes, corn, condiments, meat, vegetables and drinks. This loan will help her business to be more efficient and to satisfy the demand of her customers. This will also proviD. her with greater economic security to cover her needs and household costs.
Her goals, with respect to her business, are to have the necessary conditions to better attend to her customers, and to offer the most popular dishes based on demand. She also wants to see her children finish their university studies.

loans.use: the purchase of tomatoes, corn, condiments, meat, vegetables and drinks

loans.name: Pedro Dario

texts.es:
Pedro Dario B. A., tiene 22años, es soltero, vive con los hermanos cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No Tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

Pedro se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

texts.en:
Pedro Dario B. A. is 22 years old. He is single and lives with his brothers in the Ventanas canton, Los Ríos province. He has no children. 

The members of the rural bank VALLE ALTO live in the Voluntad de Dios community, belonging to the Ventanas canton. This bank is dedicated to short cycle agricultural work, planting corn and rice.  

Pedro grows corn and rice. He buys and sells his products in the Comercial Peña, and he sells his products in the Ventanas market every day.  

He is asking for the loan to plant corn, and to buy materials and seed. The loan will help him financially to meet his needs and to face challenges such as pests and disease. His dream is to buy a motorcycle.  

He likes to dedicate his time to Jesus Christ.

loans.name: Rachael

With the help of the loan from BRAC, Rachael hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees.  In the future, Rachael hopes to own animals.        Rachael is a member of BRAC’s Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program, which has helped her prospects for the future by teaching her how to play netball.

texts.en:
Edy Patricio Z. V. is 35 years old and lives in a civil union with his partner and children in the canton Ventanas, in the province of Los Rios. He has 2 children.

The members of the V.R.C Valle Alto are located in the community Voluntad de Dios, belonging to the canton Ventanas. This rural group works in short-cycle agriculture planting corn and rice.

Edy works in agriculture planting corn and rice, he buys and sells the products at windows in the Peña commercial market, and sells at home or at the window market every day.   

He is requesting this loan to plant corn and buy fertilizers and seeds. The support of this loan would help him economically to provide for his necessities. He confronts challenges such as pests, diseases, and variations in climate. His dream is to have his own house. He likes to do sports.

loans.use: Purchase of fertilizers and seeds

texts.en:

To help expand her business, Sylvia has requested a loan of 300,000 UGX from Kiva partner, BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase medicine. With the help of the loan from BRAC, Sylvia hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees. In the future, she hopes to become a teacher. Sylvia is a member of BRAC’s Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program, which has helped her prospects for the future and taught her how to play netball.

To help expand her business, Joweria has requested a loan of 100,000 UGX from Kiva partner, BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more charcoal. With the help of her loan from BRAC, Joweria hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees. In the future, she hopes to own a retail shop. Joweria is a member of BRAC’s Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program, which has helped her prospects for the future by teaching her how to save.

loans.use: To purchase more charcoal for resale

loans.name: Mery Frida

texts.es:
La Sra Mery Frida se dedica a la peluqueria, tiene un salon de Belleza que ella lo administra, lo atiende, y gracias su eficiencia en su trabajo ella ha podido tenre una demanda muy alta de clientes que necesita ampliar el local y renobar sus equipos.
Ella empezo desde muy joven en el campo conla cria de ganado pero, con el tiempo migro a la ciudad, esperando una mejro vida, empezo con un pequeño cuarto en su propia casa donde atendia solo por las tardes, ahora ese pequeño ambiente no le alcanza para poder atender a todos sus clientes; por ese motivo se vio en la necesidad de ampliar un ambiente mas comodo donde pueda brindar un mejor servicio y comprar mas equipos, que le generara mas ingresos.
La sra. Mery vive por la zona de Puntiti al Este de la ciudad de Cochabamba, tiene una expericia de 5 años en el rubro que se desempeña, tiene 3 hijos 1 de ellos ya terminara este año el colegio; la Sra Mery se encarga sola de sus hijos desde hace 5 años pues su esposo viajo a la Argentina buscando mejores oportunidades pero no ha regresado desde entonces ni tampoco les envia dinero.
texts.en:
Mrs Mery Frida is a hairstylist. She owns and runs a beauty salon. Thanks to her efficiency, she has had so much customer demand that she needs to expand her shop and renew her equipment.
She started working in the fields caring for livestock at a very young age, but in time she migrated to the city hoping for a better life. She started with a small room in her own home where she only worked in the afternoons. Now this small space is not enough to tend to all of her customers; for this reason, she has found it necessary to expand into a more comfortable location where she will be able to offer a better service and buy more equipment. This will generate her more income.
Mery lives in the Puntiti zone, to the east of the city of Cochabamba. She has 5 years' experience in hairstyling. She has 3 children, and one of them will finish school this year. Mrs Mery has taken care of her children alone for five years because her husband traveled to Argentina in search of better opportunities and has not returned, nor does he send them money.

loans.use: the purchase of beauty salon equipment; working capital

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

texts.en:
Carlos Armando B. C. is 22 years old, single, and lives with his parents in Ventanas canton, in Los Rios province.  He doesn't have any children.

The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Carlos is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  He buys and sells his products in the Peña shopping center in Ventanas, he also sells his products from his home or in Ventanas market every day.

Carlos is requesting this loan so that he can sow his corn.  He will buy supplies and seeds.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges in his work such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  His dream is to own his own home and car, to improve his farming and to always be together with his family.

Carlos likes taking part in sports and chatting with his friends.

loans.use: To buy supplies and seeds

loans.name: Iris Lorena

texts.es:
Doña iris, tiene 44 años de edad, vive con sus tres hijos y su madre, en el Puerto el Triunfo, departamento de Usulután, se dedica a la venta de tamales y atol de elote, este negocio lo tiene desde hace 4 años, y su forma de vender es a través de un coche de tricicleta, en este instala la venta y sale por las calles ofreciendo sus productos.
Actualmente ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar elotes para el atol y para los tamales  maíz, pollo y condimentos, prácticamente está adquiriendo toda la materia prima para poder hacer sus ventas. Con esta ayudara realizara sus ventas sin mayor atraso y sin preocuparse por los ingredientes, progresando de esta manera hacia un negocio mejor y con mayores ganancias para el beneficio de su familia.
texts.en:
Doña Iris is 44 years old and lives with her three children and mother in Puerto el Triunfo in the department of Usulután.  She sells tamales and cornflower drink from her tricycle cart that she drives through the streets offering her products.  She has been conducting this business for 4 years now.

She is requesting this loan to buy corn for the beverage she makes and corn, chicken and condiments for the tamales.  This is bascially everything she needs for her sales.  With this help she will be able to continue her sales without delay and without worrying about how to acquire her ingredients.  She hopes her business will increase and provide more income for her family.

loans.use: To buy corn, chicken and condiments for her tamales and cornflower drink

loans.name: Christine

Hilda engages in agriculture, growing maize and rice. She buys and sells the products in Ventanas and in the Comercial Peña, and she also sells them every day at her house or in the market.

The loan she is requesting will be used to sow maize by buying supplies and seeds. The loan will help her economically, as thanks to it she will fulfill her needs, as well as face challenges such as pests, illnesses and climate changes. She dreams of buying a house and some land to grant a future to her children.

She likes practicing sports with her children.

loans.use: To buy supplies and seeds.

loans.name: El Esfuerzo Group

texts.es:
el grupo El Esfuerzo esta integrado por tres personas con un gran deseo de salir adelante, ellos se dedican a negocios diferentes y a continuacion se detallan las diferentes actividades que ellos realizan:

el señor Dilmer T. tiene 30 años de edad, se dedica a la compra y venta de leña en raja,  esta leña la extrae del mar, el Mangle que ya no sirve como arbol lo saca del mar con una lancha y lo trae para venderlo en los barrios pulperias de la zona de San Lorenzo. el credito lo utilizara para la reparacion de su lancha que es el alma de su negocio.

don Jose Mario C. es un hombre que vive en union libre con la señora Glenys Godines con quien tiene dos hijos, viven humildemente y nos comento de sus planes que tienen para sacar adelante su negocio, el credito lo utilizara para surtir su pulperia que tiene en su casa, aqui vende de todo tipo de productos para el consumo diario, desde hace 1 año esta creciendo poco a poco con su negocio.
 
doña Claudia M. es madre soltera y trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia, tiene un hijo de 8 años, viven humildemente. Claudia se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa nueva, se traslada de casa en casa en los barrios y colonias de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, vendiedo ropa interior, pantalones, camisas, cameras, blusas, calsonetas, faldas.

todos necesitan el credito para sacar adelante sus negocios y sus familias.
texts.en:
The "El Esfuerzo" (Effort) group is comprised of three people who have a great desire to succeed.  They have different business activities which are the following:

Mr. Dilmer T. is 30 years old and he sells firewood which he recovers from the sea.  With his motorboat he pulls mangled tree remains out of the sea to be sold in neighborhoods around San Lorenzo.  He plans to use the loan to repair his motorboat which is the soul of his business.

Don Jose Mario C. lives in a common-law situation with Mrs. Glenys Godines and they have two children.  They live very modestly and he has plans to develop his business.  For a year now he has been operating a grocery store out of his home where he sells all kinds of staple products.
 
Doña Claudia M. is a single mother and works hard to provide an income for her family which lives very modestly.  She has an 8-year-old son.  Claudia buys and sells new clothing.  She works on a door-to-door basis in the neighborhoods and colonies in the city of San Lorenzo.  She offers underwear, pants, shirts, nightgowns, blouses, and skirts.

All of the members are in need of a loan in order to further their business and take care of their families.

loans.use: To buy motoboat repair parts, clothing, firewood, beans, rice, sugar, margarine, oil, bread, coffee, salt, cookies, softdrinks, corn and wheat flour

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

Edison is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  He buys and sells his products in Peña shopping center and also sells from his own home or in Ventadas market every day.

Edison is requesting this loan so that he can sow his corn.  He will buy supplies and seeds.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.
